source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Shading Masters: The 4 Steps to Shading Drawing Course
items.headline: The Simple 4 Step Strategy For Creating  Consistent Shading In All Of Your Drawings
objectives_summary: Use A Proven 4 Step Shading Strategy To Shade Every Drawing
Know Exactly What Tools to Use and Avoid Overwhelm
Use Contrast To Make Your Images Pop Off The Page.

items.title: Introduction to Botanical Art - Eucalyptus Leaves
items.headline: Suitable for beginner or intermediate artists, you will learn to paint a botanical watercolour of Eucalyptus leaves.
objectives_summary: To paint eucalyptus leaves in watercolour.
The equipment needed for botanical watercolour painting.
Different watercolour techniques to build up your painting.

items.title: Learn to paint with Alcohol Inks
items.headline: Alcohol Ink is a wonderful medium to start your beautiful new painting.  You will enjoy seeing what you create
objectives_summary: Paint beautiful gallery ready art on ceramic tile with Alcohol Inks

items.title: Jewelry Making: Wire Wrapping Found Objects & Unusual Shapes
items.headline: Learn how to create wire-wrapped pendants using simple tools and a found object like a seashell, rock, or other item.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to create three different pendants.
You will learn about the tools that are used for wire wrapping.
You will also learn two different single wire designs and a multiple wire design.

items.title: Mandala Rock Painting: Complete and easy step-by-step class
items.headline: Breakdown of all the steps, tools, supplies, and techniques to paint a beautiful mandala rock
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint a beautiful mandala rock  and about the tools, paints, and other supplies required.

items.title: The Basics of Writing a Compelling Short Story
items.headline: How to create stories that capture readers and develop your skills as a writer
objectives_summary: Write in a way that will feel more honest and natural to readers.
Avoid common mistakes.
Build strong writing habits

items.title: Colorful Silver Jewelry - A Comprehensive Jewelry Course
items.headline: A fun fast-tracked course to get you making amazing jewelry like a professional
objectives_summary: They will be able to make the necklace demonstrated in the course, or use their skills to produce their own designs.

items.title: English Calligraphy
items.headline: The Beginners Guide
objectives_summary: Calligraphy - English, Lettering, Creative Writing, Artistic Writing

items.title: Colored Pencils Art Class
items.headline: Gain a whole new perspective on the way you color with easy to pick up colored pencil drawing and coloring techniques
objectives_summary: Gain a new perspective on coloring
Acquire skills to add color to your own work
Discover how to draw with colored pencils using various styles and techniques

items.title: Prepare Your Comic, Manga or Graphic Novel For Print
items.headline: How to make your comic or manga look awesome in print!
objectives_summary: Understand the comic/manga/graphic novel production process from initial sketches to final artwork
Feel confident about creating a comic/manga/graphic novel for print
Turn an existing webcomic into a print-ready document

items.title: Watercolor Art Lake Scene with Birds - Paint Step by Step
items.headline: Create an amazing Watercolor Painting your very first time with this easy step by step Artist guided course.
objectives_summary: Feel comfortable using watercolors, mixing paints, and working with a wet background
Know the materials used for creating a 5x7 watercolor
Feel accomplished by completing a watercolor painting

items.title: Landscape Painting: Paint Your Own Stunning Landscapes

visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: The Ultimate Resource To Creating Quality Landscape Art: All Mediums Welcome
objectives_summary: How to organize your approach for painting landscape subjects.
Ideas for simplifying the thousands of details within a landscape.
The power of value hierarchy and how it impacts depth within a scene.

items.title: Brushstroke Masterclass: Learn 40+ Easy Painting Techniques

visible_instructors.job_title: Creative Class Instructor and Bakery Business Mentor
visible_instructors.title: Melissa Fryer
visible_instructors.name: Melissa

items.headline: Discover how to quickly master 40+ acrylic painting brushstroke techniques, using only 4 brushes and 4 tools!
objectives_summary: How to Use Just 4 Brushes and 4 Tools to Master Over 40 Acrylic Painting Techniques
How to Prepare Yourself Mentally and Physically to Paint
Ideas and Strategies to Set Up your Art Area Like a Pro

items.title: Mixed-Media Collage Workshop: Art Projects for Beginners
items.headline: Learn to Create 8 Mixed-Media Drawing & Painting Collage Projects. Designed for Beginners & Young Artists of All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 8 collage masterpieces!
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create future masterpieces.

items.title: ESSENTIAL SKILL - COLOR VALUES & make your work stand out.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: Understand & use watercolor paint values in your paintings will take you to a new level getting your paintings noticed.
objectives_summary: Understand colour 'values' in watercolours and how to use them.
Learn how to make your watercolour painting work stand out from the rest.
Learn how to make you watercolour paintings look more realistic.

items.title: Understanding Color: A Comprehensive Course for Artists

visible_instructors.name: Jill
visible_instructors.title: Jill Poyerd
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist and Fine Arts Educator

items.headline: A deep look into the history, science and application of Color Theory
objectives_summary: Gain a well-rounded understanding of what color is.
Learn the difference between color from light versus pigment.
Understand how and why people see color differently.
